p: Two hundred and twelve healthy adults (age from 18 to 59 years) were enrolled in the study and each received a single dose of seasonal TIV. Whole-blood specimens were collected for HI antibody test and IFITM3 rs12252 genotyping on days 0 and 28 after immunization. In all, 49 donors (23.11%) demonstrated the IFITM3 rs12252-T/T genotype, 107 (50.47%) had the IFITM3 rs12252-C/T genotype, and 56 (26.42%) exhibited the IFITM3 rs12252-C/C genotype ( Figure 1a). Moreover, no significant difference was observed between the three IFITM3 rs12252 genotypes in different age groups and sexes (Table S2).
